activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#8198
activity.text:
@nihal467 

One more thing, the `README.md` does not specify the credentials to login as a State Admin. Shouldn't it be in the `README.md`?

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#8198
activity.text:
@nihal467 

For the State Admin, the `Advanced Filters` in the `Discharged Patients` list has the following extra filters:

In the `Patient Detail based` section:
  1. `Admitted To (Bed Types)`
  2. `Review Missed`

In the `Geography based` section:
  1. `Facility`
  2. `Facility Type`
  
Other than these two parts, all the filters are same for the State Admin and other users.

I think the `Geography based` extra filters don't need to be removed so that the State Admin can filter the patients according to a specific facility. Right?
Now what about the `Patient Detail based` extra filters?

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#8131
activity.text:
I want to clarify a few things regarding this issue.

1. This is information about types and number of beds in a location: 
![main](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/62eb72c9-8c7c-4702-b1a6-c4cae7560240)

Do you want the above information to be shown on the outlined FacilityCard on this page?
![WhatsApp Image 2024-07-15 at 1 25 28 AM](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/998fe92b-9dcf-466e-91fc-ce1cc8b0dbf8)

2. Do you have any design preferences? Because accommodating all the information into the small FacilityCard will change the design alot!
